Package org.apache.pivot.wtk.media

Contains classes that provide multimedia support.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ImageListener
    Image listener interface.
    MovieListener
    Movie listener interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferedImageSerializer
    Implementation of the Serializer interface that reads and writes instances of BufferedImage.
    Drawing
    Image encapsulating an SVG diagram.
    Image
    Abstract base class for images.
    Image.ImageListenerList
    Image listener list.
    Image.LoadTask
    Task that executes an image load operation.
    Movie
    Abstract base class for movies.
    Movie.MovieListenerList
    Movie listener list.
    MovieListener.Adapter
    Movie listener adapter.
    Picture
    Image representing a bitmapped picture.
    SVGDiagramSerializer
    SVG diagram serializer.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BufferedImageSerializer.Format
    Supported image formats.
    Picture.Interpolation
    Enum defining the algorithms to apply when resizing a picture.

Package org.apache.pivot.wtk.media Description

Contains classes that provide multimedia support.
